original_title: 出張先で軽蔑している中年セクハラ上司とまさかの相部屋に…朝まで続く絶倫性交に不覚にも感じてしまった私
overview: Saika finds herself in the dilemma of having to choose between her ugly but kind boyfriend and her asshole boss who is full of confidence.  Luckily for her, the boss decided without even asking her.
title: I was unexpectedly sharing a room with a middle-aged sexually harassing boss whom I despise on a business trip… I, Ayaka Kawakita, who felt unintentionally by the sexual intercourse that lasted until morning!
